tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to improper access control, which allows lower-privileged users to execute plugin settings without the required permissions. This can lead to unauthorized configuration changes or actions being performed by users with insufficient privileges.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `appsero/client` library to the patch version.
